attributes.review:
I was excited for this app, I downloaded it to show my support to my President but once I downloaded it and opened the app it asked for my number which I indeed gave it to them but it took them a long time to contact me back. After a while the app started spamming me notifications and texts back to back asking if I wanted to donate money and telling me other ways I can support my dear president.
I was forced to silence the notifications from the app and even when I did it keep spamming me! ğŸ˜¡
I will be giving this app one star if I could give it any less I would! ğŸ˜¡

Anyways I downloaded the apps again and reset my phone everything seemed fine until the Wi-fi stopped working . Overall this is a terrible app to me and do not recommend for anyoneâ€™s security please do me a favor and avoid this app

attributes.review: The fitness gram pacer test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20m pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Lineup at the start. The running speed start slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear the signal. âœ¨Dingâœ¨A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. âœ¨Dingâœ¨Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. Your test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start
attributes.title: Up. Down.

attributes.review: This app is awful! It took 10 hours to download and took 30 minutes to load, I timed it. It drained 50% of my battery in 3 minutes, I also timed it. Then it stole all my data and took all my storage! It's so awful!!!! After that 10,300 trump supporters showed up to my door and ate two of my cats. They unhinged their jaw like a snake and swallowed them whole. Then they stole my orange cat and put a blonde wig on him because they thought he was trump. They started chanting about how spray tan is a religion and started sacrificing american flags to my cat!!!! unbelievable!!!! never download this app!

attributes.review: I woke up one morning after a long night of scrolling through facebook minion memes to see this app on my phone. First thing i noticed was our beautiful orange daddy at the beginning, and thought this app was going to be good, boy was i wrong. It kept making my phone lag when all i wanted to do was play candy crush and text my PTA moms, but it just BROKE my phone. My phone worked perfectly fine before this, so iâ€™m sure it was this app. I couldnâ€™t even contact my sons soccer coach to cheat on my husband, Chad, with. how disappointing. I would like to speak to your manager.
